accessibility.focus_visible: 2px gold outline on all interactive elements

design_principles_addressed: Minimalism & White Space — warm off-white bg, generous spacing scale, 740px content max-width
Bold Typography & Visual Hierarchy — Cormorant Garamond headings with clamp() fluid sizing, drop caps, gold accent bars
User-Centric Navigation — uppercase nav with animated underline, search with gold focus glow, category pills
Engaging Visuals & Multimedia — rounded images, hover zoom on desktop, styled galleries, embedded video shadow
Mobile-First & Responsive — 3 breakpoints (phone/tablet/desktop), full-width buttons on mobile, print styles
Accessibility & Inclusivity — WCAG AA contrast, focus-visible outlines, prefers-reduced-motion, prefers-contrast, skip links
Strategic CTAs — gold buttons with hover lift, outline variant, styled newsletter/CTA blocks
